summary_md: Armenia, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 5,378 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 0.27% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 13.33% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 77.47 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 80.00% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 76.35% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Armenia's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 5,378 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an export growth rate of 76.35% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market shows an unemployment rate of 13.33% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating the percentage of the workforce that is jobless.
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Armenia is at 80.00% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), reflecting the proportion of the population with internet access.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Armenia is 77.47 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), suggesting the general health and longevity of the population.
